descriptions.b: to be strongly attracted to doing something
descriptions.d: the act of doing something again
descriptions.e: an opinion or recommendation about what someone should do
descriptions.f: a short walk around your local area
descriptions.g: to put something over something so that you can't see it
descriptions.h: an expression used before the last thing in a list, to say that it is equally as important

question: The teacher wants the students to …
options: a. take notes after she has finished speaking.
b. take notes while she is speaking.

question: The teacher suggests finding a study place with a lot of …
If students feel stressed they should …
options: b. go out for a walk.

question: Students are advised to …
options: a. select the important things to learn.
c. make notes about every topic.

question: The teacher understands that repeating things can be …
Students can do past exam papers …
options: b. at home if they take photocopies.
c. in the after-school study group.

question: The teacher recommends a break of five minutes every …
It's important to …
options: b. sleep when you feel tired.

question: The teacher is sure that the students will …
